select so.ORG_FLOW,so.ORG_NAME,eu.MAJOR_ID,eu.MAJOR_NAME from pdsci.edu_question qs left join pdsci.edu_user eu on qs.user_flow=eu.user_flow left join pdsci.sys_user su on su.user_flow= eu.user_flow left join pdsci.sys_org so on so.org_flow=su.org_flow where eu.record_status='Y' and eu.record_status='Y' and eu.record_status='Y' and eu.record_status='Y'
and qs.course_flow=#{courseFlow}
and (so.org_name like #{condition} or eu.major_name like #{condition})
GROUP BY eu.MAJOR_ID,so.ORG_FLOW,so.ORG_NAME,eu.MAJOR_NAME

select QUESTION_FLOW, eq.USER_FLOW, eq.COURSE_FLOW, eq.CHAPTER_FLOW, QUESTION_STATUS_ID, QUESTION_STATUS_NAME, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_TIME, SUBMIT_TEACHER, QUINTESSENCE,COURSE_NAME,CHAPTER_NAME,USER_NAME,ec.course_flow as ec_course_flow, ecc.chapter_flow as ecc_chapter_flow,su.user_flow as su_user_flow from pdsci.edu_question eq left join pdsci.edu_course ec on eq.course_flow = ec.course_flow left join pdsci.edu_course_chapter ecc on eq.chapter_flow = ecc.chapter_flow left join pdsci.sys_user su on ecc.teacher_id = su.user_flow where eq.record_status = 'Y' and ec.record_status = 'Y' and ecc.record_status='Y'
and (course_name like #{courseNameLike} or question_content like #{courseNameLike} )
and eq.user_flow = #{question.userFlow}
order by question_time desc

select QUESTION_FLOW, eq.USER_FLOW, eq.COURSE_FLOW, eq.CHAPTER_FLOW, QUESTION_STATUS_ID, QUESTION_STATUS_NAME, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_TIME, SUBMIT_TEACHER, QUINTESSENCE,COURSE_NAME,CHAPTER_NAME,USER_NAME,ec.course_flow as ec_course_flow, ecc.chapter_flow as ecc_chapter_flow,su.user_flow as su_user_flow from pdsci.edu_question eq left join pdsci.edu_course ec on eq.course_flow = ec.course_flow left join pdsci.edu_course_chapter ecc on eq.chapter_flow = ecc.chapter_flow left join pdsci.sys_user su on ecc.teacher_id = su.user_flow where eq.record_status = 'Y' and ec.record_status = 'Y' and ecc.record_status='Y' and question_flow = #{questionFlow}

select ANSWER_FLOW, QUESTION_FLOW, ANSWER_USER_FLOW, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_TIME, su.user_flow as su_user_flow,USER_NAME,ORG_NAME, eu.user_flow as eu_user_flow,MAJOR_NAME,su.USER_HEAD_IMG from pdsci.edu_answer ea left join pdsci.sys_user su on ea.answer_user_flow = su.user_flow left join pdsci.edu_user eu on ea.answer_user_flow = eu.user_flow where ea.record_status = 'Y' and eu.record_status = 'Y' and su.record_status = 'Y' and question_flow = #{questionFlow} order by answer_time desc

select ANSWER_FLOW, QUESTION_FLOW, ANSWER_USER_FLOW, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_TIME, eq.question_flow as eq_question_flow ,su.user_flow as su_user_flow user_name,org_name,eu.user_flow as eu_user_flow,major_name,su.user_head_img,ecc.chapter_flow as ecc_chapter_flow,chapter_name,ec.course_flow as ec_course_flow,course_name from pdsci.edu_answer ea left join pdsci.edu_question eq on ea.question_flow = eq.question_flow left join pdsci.sys_user su on eq.user_flow = su.user_flow left join pdsci.edu_user eu on eq.user_flow = eu.user_flow left join pdsci.edu_course_chapter ecc on eq.chapter_flow = ecc.chapter_flow left join pdsci.edu_course ec on ecc.course_flow = ec.course_flow where ea.record_status = 'Y' and eq.record_status = 'Y' and su.record_status = 'Y' and eu.record_status = 'Y' and ec.record_status = 'Y' and ecc.record_status = 'Y' and answer_flow = #{answerFlow}
